name: Dream Broker
tag_list: saas, software-as-a-service, online-video, software, cloud, screenmail
overview:
Dream Broker is a Finnish online video software company that offers a cloud-based software for creating, editing and sharing online videos. The solution enables more efficient training, learning and internal communication, among others.

With Dream Broker, anyone in the organization can instantly create and deliver self-made video content in a secure enterprise environment. Dream Broker’s vision is to make online videos available in everyone’s daily business – anywhere, anytime and on any device.

Dream Broker was founded in 2007 and currently employes over 60 people. The company is one of the fastest-growing companies in Finland with hundreds of loyal customers and an annual growth rate of over 100% since its launch. In 2012 Dream Broker won Deloitte’s “Technology Fast 50” in Finland and came 39th in the EMEA area after growing an astonishing 2712% during 2007-2011. In 2011, Dream Broker’s annual turnover was €1.47 million, and the target for 2012 is approximately €3 million.

Dream Broker is headquartered in Helsinki and has an office in Stockholm as well - next one will soon be opened in Copenhagen. The organization consists of young, innovative and highly educated people from the domains of technology, business and social sciences. Dream Broker aims to become a significant international player in the digital online video software market by 2015.

relationships.title: Deputy Managing Director at Dream Broker AB

milestones.description: Dream Broker was awarded the prize of the fastest-growing Finnish technology company in the Technology Fast 50 competition, arranged for the eighth time by Deloitte. The software company has grown 2,712% between 2007 and 2011.
milestones.source_description: Dream Broker won Deloitte's Technology Fast 50 Competition after growing 2712% between 2007 and 2011

milestones.description: Dream Broker expands internationally and opens a new office in Sweden.
milestones.source_description: Dream Broker opens its first international office, in Stockholm Sweden
